org.jclouds.ec2.services

Interface InstanceAsyncClient

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AWSInstanceAsyncClient

    public interface InstanceAsyncClient
    Provides access to EC2 Instance Services via their REST API.

    Author:
    Adrian Cole
